1.0.name: wordpress/gbs-ad-shopping
1.0.description:
This plugin lets you add - to any spot on your blog's sidebar - a section for links to your favorite stores. This plugin creates a sidebar widget that pulls in links to your favorite stores from the GreenBackStreet.com website. This is accomplished by parsing an RSS data feed from GreenBackStreet.

A free GreenBackStreet.com membership is required in order to select your favorites. The stores your select on GreenBackStreet.com as your favorite stores will appear in your sidebar with links to go shopping at those stores.

The links created in your blog's sidebar are customized to your GreenBackStreet.com membership and will therefore generate Cash Back in your GreenBackStreet.com account whenever anyone purchases through one of the links on your site created by this widget.

See GreenBackStreet.com for terms of receiving payment for any such purchases. Stores that drop out of the GreenBackStreet.com program will automatically disappear from this sidebar.
